name: Enter The Flannelverse (Demo) MAC Version
description:
You wake up in a strange world and are greeted by Rheya, a lady of mystery. Unknowing of where you are and with scattered memories,  you, along with a party of ragtag allies, go on a quest to save Flanta and return home. (Characters, story and references are from the channel "RyanLikesFlannel").

***Please notify me of any bugs, it's my first game after all so theres bound to be some lol.***
